alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 8:18PM CDT until August 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Benton County in central Missouri... Morgan County in central Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cole Camp, or 14 miles south of Sedalia, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks, Versailles, Lincoln, Cole Camp, Stover, Barnett, Syracuse, Gravois Mills, Ionia, Mora, Florence and Crockerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
